data.text: @DRSmith2552 wasn't talking about vaccines, just masks.
@Rossputin Also, the vaccine mandate ignores natural immunity.
@Rossputin You don’t have to wear that on your private jet - that’s just for the peons on commercial
@Rossputin Yeah, protest on a commercial airliner, and tape the incident.

@Rossputin At least you can take your mask off at the end of the day.  The truckers are protesting vaccine mandates, mask mandates and other Covid restrictions.  You should be thankful as they are standing up for your right too.

@Rossputin An erosion of freedoms in the name of  public health isn't worth standing against. Ignorant truck drivers should stay in their lane and realize how much freedom they have been granted by generous officials.
@Rossputin Pretty sure the blissful truck drivers are protesting the forced injection of an experimental drug for the privilege of keeping their jobs. Cute mask picture though.
